radiographic_examinations.findings: The liver is of homogeneous echotexture without any concerning focal lesions. There is a small 8 x 8 x 10 mm simple cyst near the gallbladder fossa. The portal vein is patent with normal hepatopetal flow. There is no intra or extrahepatic biliary dilatation and the common bile duct measures 7 mm. The gallbladder is mildly distended with sludge. No gallstones are identified. The gallbladder wall appears less thickened than on the prior study.
radiographic_examinations.changes_over_time: The gallbladder wall appears less thickened than on the prior study.
